title: Upgrader
desc:
Post 75
 - Turn one of your <:charge:1240849067362488403>s into a <:corrupted_charge:1240975576324509787> or <:brick:1240979537328865411> , OR
 - Increase the number of uses of another item by 1, OR
 - Add the **Safe** keyword to a round, decided by you stating its position in the shotgun, OR
 - Remove the **Clunky** keyword from an item, OR
 - Add OR remove the **Unique** keyword from something.
